reviewText: Good instruction but the best way to learn is just get out to the lake/river and start fishing with a flyrod.

This DVD is older photography, but helpful - it fills in a lot of knowledge gaps that you can watch over and over again - how to tie certain knowts, differences and purposes of various types of lines, tips on various types of casts, etc.  And it has some fun live-catch scenes, as well.  Personally, I like it - it's sort of a "go-to" watch several times over the colder months for review and for a fix!
